subSections.title: Ireena Kolyana
subSections.content:
- Role: Adopted daughter of Kolyan Indirovich, sought by Strahd.
- Personality: Courageous but haunted by her past.
traits: Strong-willed and protective of her family.
Haunted by gaps in her memory from Strahd's influence.
subSections.motivation: Wants to escape Strahd and protect her loved ones.
subSections.connection: Carries the soul of Tatyana, Strahd's lost love.

subSections.title: Ismark Kolyanovich (Ismark the Lesser)
subSections.content:
- Role: Son of the late burgomaster, brother of Ireena.
- Personality: Brave, loyal, but burdened by his father's legacy.
traits: Seeks to protect his sister at all costs.
Not as dour as most Barovians; willing to take risks.
subSections.motivation: Protect Ireena by getting her away from Barovia Village.
subSections.connection: Seeks allies to take Ireena to Vallaki or another safer place.

subSections.title: Mad Mary
subSections.content:
- Role: Distraught mother searching for her missing daughter.
- Personality: Grief-stricken and paranoid.
traits: Rarely leaves her house.
Spends her days crying over her daughter’s disappearance.
subSections.motivation: Wants to find her missing daughter, Gertruda.
subSections.connection: Blames herself for her daughter's disappearance, unaware that Gertruda went willingly to Castle Ravenloft.

subSections.title: Bildrath Cantemir
subSections.content:
- Role: Shopkeeper of Bildrath's Mercantile.
- Personality: Greedy and unyielding.
traits: Charges ten times the price for any item.
Uninterested in the well-being of others unless it profits him.
subSections.connection: His nephew, Parriwimple, works for him as a shop assistant and enforcer.

subSections.title: Parriwimple
subSections.content:
- Role: Nephew of Bildrath, shop assistant.
- Personality: Strong but simple-minded.
traits: Physically imposing, with a gentle demeanor.
Devoted to his uncle, obeys his commands without question.
subSections.motivation: Protect Bildrath and help in the shop.
subSections.connection: Known for his strength but has no ill will towards others.

subSections.title: Arik Lorensk
subSections.content:
- Role: Barkeep at the Blood of the Vine Tavern.
- Personality: Apathetic and robotic.
traits: Speaks in a monotone and shows little emotion.
Repeats tasks without thinking, such as cleaning glasses endlessly.
subSections.connection: Works for the Vistani owners of the tavern.

subSections.title: Alenka, Mirabel, and Sorvia
subSections.content:
- Role: Vistani owners of the Blood of the Vine Tavern.
- Personality: Wary and opportunistic.
traits: Show little interest in strangers unless they see an opportunity.
Willing to offer information about Madam Eva if approached by other Vistani.
subSections.motivation: Maintain their livelihood and stay in Strahd's good graces.
subSections.connection: Have ties to Madam Eva and know much about Barovia.

subSections.title: Madam Eva
subSections.content:
- Role: Vistani seer, leader, and ally against Strahd.
- Personality: Cryptic and all-knowing.
traits: Can see into the past and future of the adventurers.
Appears calm and collected, with hidden depths of knowledge.
subSections.motivation: Wants to free Barovia from Strahd's grasp.
subSections.connection: Connected to Strahd's past, and holds the secrets to the adventurers’ future.

subSections.title: Donavich
subSections.content:
- Role: Priest of the Barovian church.
- Personality: Devout but slowly succumbing to despair.
traits: Desperate to save his son, who has become a vampire spawn.
Prays constantly, hoping for divine intervention.
subSections.motivation: Seeks a miracle to save his son, Doru.
subSections.connection: Knows details about Ireena’s origins and the spirits rising from the cemetery.

subSections.title: Doru
subSections.content:
- Role: Donavich's son, turned into a vampire spawn.
- Personality: Starving, desperate, and aggressive.
traits: Begs for blood, willing to attack to get it.
Remembers the failed rebellion against Strahd.
subSections.connection: Was part of a failed attack on Castle Ravenloft, led by a mysterious wizard.

subSections.title: Morgantha
subSections.content:
- Role: Night hag in disguise, seller of dream pastries.
- Personality: Deceptive and sinister.
traits: Appears as an old woman selling pastries that bring blissful dreams.
Willing to trade children in exchange for her dream pastries.
subSections.motivation: Prey on the despair of Barovians and gather souls.
subSections.connection: Operates from Old Bonegrinder and has her own dark plans beyond Strahd's influence.
